WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 11 APR
   BY M/V SW EMPRESS TOWING 14 9260 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-56.43S 039-37.75W, 22-10.13S 039-37.75W,
   22-23.82S 039-47.53W, 22-31.50S 039-46.98W,
   22-46.67S 039-53.75W, 22-49.15S 039-59.36W,
   22-34.27S 040-24.12W, 22-19.43S 040-24.07W,
   22-13.98S 040-20.02W, 22-03.70S 040-20.75W,
   21-55.13S 040-14.77W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 967/22.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 12 APR 22.
